column4: when i mount a partition to a particular directorya nd then i reboot...it goes away.  Anyone know what i'm doing wrong?
if you want a partition to be there after rebooting, you need to make an entry in /etc/fstab
open up a terminal and enter 'man fstab'; this will explain what you need to do; also, take a look at your current /etc/fstab file, and try to mimmick one of the other, similar entries
